com.tumblr.backboard.imitator

Class InertialImitator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tumblr.backboard.imitator.Imitator
      • com.tumblr.backboard.imitator.EventImitator
        • com.tumblr.backboard.imitator.MotionImitator
          • com.tumblr.backboard.imitator.ConstrainedMotionImitator
            • com.tumblr.backboard.imitator.InertialImitator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.facebook.rebound.SpringListener

    public class InertialImitator
extends ConstrainedMotionImitator
implements com.facebook.rebound.SpringListener
    A ConstrainedMotionImitator that moves freely when the user is not dragging it. It copies the SpringConfig in setSpring(com.facebook.rebound.Spring) to use when the user is dragging.

    Created by ericleong on 11/6/14.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InertialImitator

        public InertialImitator(MotionProperty property,
                double minValue,
                double maxValue)
        Constructor. Uses Imitator.TRACK_ABSOLUTE and Imitator.FOLLOW_EXACT.
        Parameters:
        property - the desired property to imitate
        minValue - the minimum value
        maxValue - the maximum value

                int trackStrategy,
                int followStrategy,
                double minValue,
                double maxValue)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        property - the desired property to imitate
        trackStrategy - the tracking strategy.
        followStrategy - the follow strategy.
        minValue - the desired minimum spring value.
        maxValue - the desired maximum spring value.

      • setSpring

        public void setSpring(com.facebook.rebound.Spring spring)
        Sets the Spring that this imitator should use. This class attaches itself as a SpringListener and stores the SpringConfig to use when the user is dragging.
        Overrides:
        setSpring in class Imitator
        Parameters:
